column1: #text=I waited in a seating area near the gate at the airport .
#text=I could see the huge jetliner out the window .
#text=I looked at my ticket and saw that I was in Group 3 .
#text=When the gate attendant called my number I showed her my ticket and boarded the plane .
#text=I found my seat , 22D , and sat down , putting the small bag I had packed under the seat in front of me .
#text=After everyone was on the plane they shut the door .
#text=The flight attendant made a few announcements and I buckled myself in .
#text=The plane pulled away from the gate and taxied to a runway .
#text=We sat on the runway for a few minutes before we were given approval to take off .
#text=I was pushed back in my seat and we accelerated down the runway .
#text=The nose lifted and we were in the air .
#text=During the flight I got a drink .
#text=One hour later , the plane set down in Cleveland .
